Sun Siyam Resorts | Luxury Hotels in the Maldives & Sri Lanka
Shaped by the idyllic natural surroundings of the Maldives and Sri Lanka, Sun Siyam Resorts are sanctuaries for the free-spirited. Book your stay today.
Acres of heaven on earthFor couples, families and friends
Welcome to your 5 star home in the heart of the Maldives, where days are long and
in a setting you’ll never forget. With
and a whole host of experiences on offer, at Sun Siyam Iru Fushi, no two days are ever the same.

Over the water or on the beach, the choice is yours. Whether you opt for sunrise or sunset vistas, all of our spacious villas and retreats offer endless ocean horizons with the promise of total privacy. Outside you’ll find huge day beds to laze on, swings to enjoy the sea breeze and bathtubs big enough for two.

Walk barefoot along the softest white sand and relax in our award-winning spa, or keep going until you find a spot so private, you’ll feel like you’ve discovered your own island. And for those looking for a more active holiday, we’ve got you covered with some of the best water sports in the Maldives.
We are committed to offer a healthy, safe and luxurious, authentic Maldivian experience.

Sun Siyam Iru Fushi | 5 Star Beach Resort in the Maldives
Welcome to our 5 star luxury beach & spa resort in the heart of the Maldives, with 15 bars and restaurants and a whole host of experiences on offer. Book now.

Stay at the water villas of Sun Siyam Vilu Reef Maldives and enjoy 5 star luxury with the sand beneath your feet. The ultimate haven for honeymooners, sink into new levels of relaxation with the waves as your soundtrack. You’ll soon see why we welcome back so many familiar faces year after year.

The water villas at Sun Siyam Vilu Reef are surrounded by some of the best coral reef in the Maldives, we’ve shared the resort’s island home with exotic flora and fauna for over 20 years. Coconut palms sway in the breeze, and don’t be surprised if you spot a neighbouring heron or hermit crab en-route to breakfast.

Slow down the pace and enjoy decadent treatments in our spa, or choose to unwind in the comfort of your own suite or villa. Come evening, join our chefs as they dish up plates with artistry and flair, before ending your perfect day with a private cinema under the stars.
We are committed to offer a healthy, safe and authentic Maldivian experience.

Sun Siyam Vilu Reef | Maldives Resort | Maldives Water Villas
Welcome to Sun Siyam Vilu Reef, Maldives beach resort featuring exclusive water villas. Book now to enjoy the best accommodation rates.

From stepping off your flight, this expansive island of Olhuveli is just a 45 minute speedboat ride away. With no need for a seaplane, jump straight into exploring our three islands, or simply sink into blissful relaxation. This time together is all yours.

Traditional Maldives meets modern design at Sun Siyam Olhuveli, with accommodations ranging from Maldivian-inspired suites to sleek contemporary villas. Designed to cater to your every whim, we’ve three pools to choose from, including an adults-only infinity pool that never fails to impress – but be warned, the lagoon may entice you into adventure.

A tropical oasisOn the east coast of Sri Lanka

Set on one of the best beaches in Sri Lanka, cool and contemporary 5 star suites serve as the ideal base for exploring. Immerse yourself in the rich culture and history of this fascinating country, with some of the island’s greatest heritage sites just a short drive away.

For those looking to escape the everyday and embark on an enriching vacation, Sun Siyam Pasikudah is tranquil and intimate. With only 34 suites, days can be spent lounging by the pool or amongst the rainbow coral reef just a short snorkel away. Dine on the classics or savour Sri Lankan fare – we’re confident that our signature lentil dal is the best you’ll ever taste.

Beyond the gates a world of UNESCO Heritage Sites, breathtaking national parks and thriving neighbourhood villages awaits, where you’ll be greeted with open arms and warm, welcoming smiles. One of the most peaceful spots on the coast, we promise the crowds won’t find you here.
We are committed to offer a healthy, safe and authentic Maldivian experience.

Sun Siyam Pasikudah | 5 Star Beach Resort in Sri Lanka
Set on one of the best beaches in Sri Lanka, Sun Siyam Pasikudah's cool and contemporary 5 star suites serve as the ideal base for exploring. Book now.
A private pool paradiseFor premium all inclusive escapes

Sleek and spacious accommodations make Sun Siyam Iru Veli the ultimate tropical retreat. With front row lagoon views and a freshwater pool for every five star suite, all you have to do is check in, chill out and let our neighbouring dolphins provide your entertainment as they swim past each day.

From the moment you arrive, shoes are left at the door, so forget dress codes and come as you are. Here we live the barefoot idyll, so sit back and sink your toes into the softest white sand – it doesn’t get better than this.

Priding ourselves on innovation, our main restaurant has a daily-changing menu to mix up seasonal flavours, and we serve plenty of the ocean’s bounty with the best seafood you’ll ever taste. You can even watch exotic fish pass under the glass floor below as you sink into a relaxing massage. It’s time to discover the true meaning of rest and rejuvenation here on our sapphire waters.
We are committed to offer a healthy, safe and authentic Maldivian experience.

Designed for fun-loving, open-minded couples, romance seekers, families or larger groups of friends, with the freedom to roam, socialise and engage in an island community. Siyam World and is one of the largest islands in the Maldives to boast a resort and show-stopping residences - The Beach House Collection.

The Beach House Collection at Siyam World, Maldives embodies a secluded, pristine and idyllic island holiday experience - a true Maldivian familiarity with luxurious but modern comforts - a heaven for those who appreciate beauty and life.Set on an island playground, accompanied by an infinite collection of experiences across land, ocean, and sky, the 24 show-stopping two-to-six-Bedrooms Residences, Over-Water Pavilions & The Palace are offering an all-inclusive island getaway that is imbued with style, yet never ostentatious.Sophisticated without pretence and exceptional at every level.

All 24 Residences ranging between an expansive 510 to breath-taking 3000 square metres. The architecture reflects the tradition and cultural heritage of the Maldives as all Residences offer expansive living space, separate entrances to each bedroom, a private pool, kitchen facilities, dining areas, a hot tub, an abundance of space and complete privacy.Guests at The Beach House Collection enjoy exclusive privileges additionally to the WOW! Sun Siyam Iru Fushi | 5 Star Beach Resort in the Maldives
Welcome to our 5 star luxury beach & spa resort in the heart of the Maldives, with 15 bars and restaurants and a whole host of experiences on offer. Book now.

Since opening our first resort over 20 years ago, Sun Siyam Resorts has grown to own and manage five luxury private island properties in the Maldives and a boutique beach retreat on the East Coast of Sri Lanka.
Each is unique, but what unites them all is the genuine warmth and heartfelt hospitality of our people, many of whom have been with us since the beginning.
At Sun Siyam Resorts we think of ourselves as one family, and we look forward to welcoming you to our six island homes.

With our roots firmly established in promoting inbound tourism to the Maldives, Sun Siyam Travels was established in 1990. Our knowledgeable and passionate team are the reason it has now grown to become one of the leading tour operators and travel agents in the country.

We unveiled Sun Siyam Vilu Reef in 1998, and as our first resort in the Maldives, it holds a very special place in our hearts. Many team members have been there since the opening, and proudly welcome back our loyal guests who return year after year.

By unveiling two new resorts in the Maldives, we firmly established ourselves as a leading luxury resort owner and operator in the country. Sun Siyam Olhuveli was opened in 2002, followed by Sun Siyam Iru Fushi, in 2008.

2014 saw us open our first resort outside of the Maldives with the launch of Sun Siyam Pasikudah, a five star beach retreat on the stunning east coast of Sri Lanka. In 2018 we added a fourth Maldivian resort to our collection, Sun Siyam Iru Veli.

Siyam World will welcome its very first guests later in 2020, and is set to completely redefine the way people vacation in the Maldives. Showcasing the most extensive lineup of facilities, services and experiences in the country, this is a private island resort unlike any other.
Hon. FDr. Ahmed Siyam Mohamed founded the company in 1990. He is the Chairman and Managing Director of the Sun Siyam Group, a diverse collective of companies proudly based in the Maldives.
Hailing from a humble background, his dedication and passion for the tourism industry has led to him being renowned as one of the most energetic and visionary business leaders in the country.

An executive board member of Maldives Association of Tourism Industry (MATI), he received the National Award for distinguished services in recognition of his work towards the sustainable development of tourism in the Republic of Maldives.
Discover our latest news and stay connected to read about the happenings at our resorts. Sign up to receive updates from Sun Siyam Resorts.
Our team members come from every part of the world, enriching our company with their diverse languages, religious beliefs, cultures and traditions.

Our Privacy Policy at Sun Siyam Resorts, the privacy and confidentiality of user information is important. We are committed to maintaining the privacy and security of your user information. We may update this policy from time to time, so please check here frequently. Resort will not disclose identifiable user information to any third party without consent. We take the utmost care to ensure that the personal information we obtain from you is not used in a way that you may be unaware of or not agreeable to. You may wish to submit an information request about our Resort, participate in one of our promotions or subscribe to our e-mail or postal mail lists. In response, we may ask for information such as your name and postal address. In the event you opt to provide us with this information, we will only use it for the purpose specified. Information collected on the Site may be used to:
• Enter your email in our promotions• Send marketing communications or surveys to you• Respond to your questions or suggestions• Improve the quality of your visit to our site

You can opt-out of any of these promotions by emailing the resort directly. We do not sell, rent or share any of your personal information with any other party including any third-party joint promoters, nor use it for unapproved commercial purposes. At the time you submit personal information or make a request, the intended use of the information you submit will be apparent in the context in which you submit it and/or because the Site states the intended purpose. By submitting personal information at the Site, you are giving your consent and permission for any use that is consistent with uses stated in this Privacy Policy or disclosed elsewhere at the Site at the point you submit such personal information, and such consent will be presumed by Resort, unless you state otherwise at the time you submit the personal information. Secure Reservations If you decide to make an online reservation at the Site, you will be linked to a reservation interface and a third party booking engine (Booking Engine) provided by our booking management system vendor.

All information sent to this site, if in an SSL session, is encrypted, protecting against disclosure to third parties. Protecting your information We would like our Site visitors to feel confident about using the Site to plan and purchase their accommodations, so Resort is committed to protecting the information we collect. Resort has implemented a security program to keep information that is stored in our systems protected from unauthorized access. Our Site is hosted in a secure environment. The Site servers/systems are configured with data encryption, or scrambling, technologies, and industry-standard firewalls. When you enter personal information during the reservation process, or during a customer email sign-up, your data is protected by Secure Socket Layer (SSL) technology to ensure safe transmission. Children’s Privacy & Parental Consent: Please be aware that Resort has not designed this Site for, and does not intend for it to be used by, anyone under age 18.

Accordingly, this Site should not be used by anyone under age 18. Our privacy policy prohibits us from accepting users who are under the age of 18. Hotel specifically requests that persons under the age of 18 not use this Site or submit or post information to the Site. Should Resort inadvertently acquire personal information or other data from users under the age of 18, Resort will not knowingly provide this data to any third party for any purpose whatsoever, and any subsequent disclosure would be due to the fact the user under age 18 used the Site and submitted personal information without solicitation by or permission from Resort. Links Provided to Other Sites Resort may provide links to a number of other web sites that we believe might offer you useful information and services. However, those sites may not follow the same privacy policies as Resort. Therefore, we are not responsible for the privacy policies or the actions of any third parties, including without limitation, any web site owners whose sites may be reached through this Site, nor can we control the activities of those web sites.

We urge you to contact the relevant parties controlling these sites or accessing their on-line policies for the relevant information about their data collection practices before submitting any personal information or other sensitive data. Cookies: When you visit the Resort’s website, some browsing-related information on your device (computer, Smartphone, tablet etc.) is likely to be recorded in files called "cookies" and stored on your device.

What are the different types of cookies? There are several categories of cookies:• Strictly necessary cookies: these cookies are essential in order to browse some websites and use all of their features (the user's operating system support, display etc.). Without these cookies, features such as the display will not have optimum functionality. Note: these cookies collect purely technical data and do not identify you personally.• Performance cookies: these cookies help us improve a user's experience by helping us understand how they use our websites (most frequently visited pages, applications used etc.). These cookies do not identify you individually.• Functionality cookies: in order to make browsing easier, these cookies store certain user preferences (language, username, country etc.).• Targeting/advertising cookies: these cookies enable a user to receive targeted advertisements based on their interests, but they also limit the number of times that the advertisements appear.• Affiliate cookies: these cookies enable third parties ("affiliates") that publish marketing campaigns on their websites to be paid on behalf of the "web merchant".• Cookies from social networks: these third-party Cookies let you communicate the content of our site to others, as well as your opinion in relation to our site. This is the case with the "Share" and "Like" buttons on "Facebook," "Twitter," "LinkedIn," "Video," etc.Social networks which offer these application buttons can identify you by these buttons, even if you did not click on one of them when you visited our site. Indeed, some Cookies allow the social network concerned to follow your navigation on our site whenever your social network account is activated on your device when at the same time, you are on our site.

We have no control over the procedures social networks use to collect information about your navigation on our site. Please read these social networks privacy policies regarding personal data. These should allow you to exercise certain privacy options with these social networks, in particular by adjusting your user accounts for each of these networks.

Why does the Resort use cookies? Cookies help us to improve the quality of your browsing experience when visiting our website. This technical process primarily allows us to:• Adapt the layout of our websites to suit your device's display preferences (language, display resolution, operating system used etc.)• Store some of the information that you fill in on our online forms to help us personalize your subsequent visits to our websites• Collect statistics. These relate mainly to the number of times you visit our websites and your use of the different services that we provide (sections and content viewed, links), with the aim of improving their relevance and usability• Put security measures in place (for example asking you to reconnect to a page or service after a certain amount of time has elapsed)• Offer you, through advertisements, personalized content that is likely to be of interest to you.

Important: Advertisements or links to third-party websites may be included on our websites. Your personal details may be collected by third parties when you click on these links. This Charter does not cover visits to third-party websites. Sun Siyam Resorts cannot be held responsible for the policy of third-parties regarding personal details and the use thereof. Your Consent To This Privacy Policy Use of the Site signifies your consent, as well as the consent of the company for whom you use the Site and whose information you submit (if any), to this on-line Privacy Policy, including the collection and use of information by Resort, as described in this statement, and also signifies agreement to the terms of use for the Site. Continued access and use of the Site without acceptance of the terms of this Privacy Policy relieves Resort from responsibility to the user. Policy Modifications & Contacting Resort: Resort reserves the right to change this Privacy Policy at any time; notice of changes will be published on this page. Changes will always be prospective, not retroactive. If you have questions about our policies, please contact: marketing@sunsiyam.com
Privacy Policy | Sun Siyam Resorts in the Maldives & Sri Lanka

Your safety and security has always been our highest priority. To ensure a worry-free stay at Sun Siyam Resorts, we’ve introduced our Sun Siyam Cares programme. Created using the latest World Health Organisation and national government guidelines, it is designed to offer a holiday experience with your wellbeing in mind, in an environment that’s safe for both our guests and team members.
We look forward to welcoming you soon.
All visitors travelling to and from the Maldives are required to submit a self-declarative health declaration online via https://imuga.immigration.gov.mv

- It is recommended to download the contact tracing app “TraceEkee”.- Request for a PCR screening shall be done 72 hours prior to departure. PCR Test requires advance booking and laboratory will confirm based on availability.- The airline requires a PCR Certificate with a validity of 96 hours. Thus the sample shall be collected on the 4th day prior to departure day. Should a guest choose to book PCR Test in advance, a clear passport copy and flight details should be sent to the resort. Please be advised if we did not receive a request prior to your arrival, PCR Test will be subject to availability.- Total cost for a PCR Test is USD175 per person, per test.- Resort has a well-equipped clinic with a doctor and nurse. Samples are collected by our resort doctor and transferred to authorized testing facility. The resort does not apply any charge towards transport of the specimen to be tested.- Test results will be made available within 24 hours to 72 hours depending on the volume and will be delivered to the guests.- In the unlikely event that the guests might be required to go in person to an authorized testing facility, and in such case, return transfer cost will be charged to guests.- The resort reserves the right to impose additional fees should the authorities change the procedure.
To facilitate contactless check in, guests should register online prior to travelling

- Guests will receive a temperature check upon arrival and periodically throughout their stay.- During arrival and departure, our teams will observe social distancing etiquette at all times.- Reception areas have been fitted with floor markers to encourage safe distancing.- Our teams have been fully trained to identify any guests with respiratory symptoms.- A full range of masks, gloves and hand sanitisers are available upon request.
All tables have been placed at least 1.5 metres apart

- Menus are available by scanning a QR code, with iPad and printed versions available upon request.- Buffet restaurants must be booked in advance. Team members will assist you with food service.- Sunbeds and beach loungers are well spaced to observe social distancing protocols.
All rooms are cleaned and then sealed, with a 24 hour vacancy period between each stay

- Air conditioning systems will be cleaned and sanitised after each guest departure.- Hand sanitiser is provided for your convenience and comfort.- All surfaces, including high-touch points, will be thoroughly cleaned and disinfected.- We’ve removed some in-room amenities such as pens, notepads and guest directories, which are now available upon request.- For your safety and reassurance, daily housekeeping services are now only available upon request.
All public areas are cleaned and sanitised throughout the day by our dedicated sanitation team

- We use Ecolab cleaning products which comply with stringent WHO and government guidelines, but are also environmentally friendly.- Hand sanitiser dispensers have been placed at the entrance to all public outlets.
All team members have been trained to adhere to WHO and national government guidelines

- A Sun Siyam Cares Manager has been appointed at all resorts to implement and monitor our guidelines.- All team members undergo regular ongoing safety training.- Our frontline team members wear personal protective equipment whilst on duty.
Our watersports, diving and fitness facilities are available in compliance with social distancing protocols
- Group activity numbers will be limited to enable social distancing.- Certain activities are only available for private parties. Details are available upon request.
All resorts are staffed by a HPA certified medical officer
- All Maldivian resorts benefit from the care of a resident doctor, with no extra charges for guest consultations.
Treatments must be pre-booked via our messaging service or by contacting the spa from your in-room phone
- Guests are politely required to shower prior to any treatments.
Due to restricted numbers, the pre-booking of our Kids Club is highly recommended

- All children are politely required to shower prior to arrival.- Children under four are not permitted to use the facilities.- In line with government guidelines, babysitting services are temporarily suspended.

Your safety and security has always been our highest priority. To ensure a worry-free stay at Sun Siyam Resorts, we’ve introduced our Sun Siyam Cares programme. Created using the latest World Health Organisation and national government guidelines, it is designed to offer a holiday experience with your wellbeing in mind, in an environment that’s safe for both our guests and team members.
All visitors travelling to and from the Maldives are required to submit a self-declarative health declaration online via https://imuga.immigration.gov.mv

- It is recommended to download the contact tracing app “TraceEkee”.- Request for a PCR screening shall be done 72 hours prior to departure. PCR Test requires advance booking and laboratory will confirm based on availability.- The airline requires a PCR Certificate with a validity of 96 hours. Thus the sample shall be collected on the 4th day prior to departure day. Should a guest choose to book PCR Test in advance, a clear passport copy and flight details should be sent to the resort. Please be advised if we did not receive a request prior to your arrival, PCR Test will be subject to availability.- Total cost for a PCR Test is USD60 per person, per test.- Resort has a well-equipped clinic with a doctor and nurse. Samples are collected by our resort doctor and transferred to authorized testing facility. The resort does not apply any charge towards transport of the specimen to be tested.- Test results will be made available within 24 hours to 72 hours depending on the volume and will be delivered to the guests.- In the unlikely event that the guests might be required to go in person to an authorized testing facility, and in such case, return transfer cost will be charged to guests.- The resort reserves the right to impose additional fees should the authorities change the procedure.

- To facilitate a contactless check in, guests are asked to register online prior to travelling to our resorts.- Guests will receive a temperature check upon arrival and periodically throughout their stay.- During arrival and departure, our teams will observe social distancing etiquette at all times.- Reception areas have been fitted with floor markers to encourage safe distancing.- Our teams have been fully trained to identify any guests with respiratory symptoms.- A full range of masks, gloves and hand sanitisers are available upon request.

- All tables have been placed at least 1.5 metres apart.- Menus are available by scanning a QR code, with iPad and printed versions available upon request.- Buffet restaurants must be booked in advance. Team members will assist you with food service.- Sunbeds and beach loungers are well spaced to observe social distancing protocols.

- All rooms are cleaned and then sealed, with a 24 hour vacancy period between each arrival to ensure the highest standards of hygiene are maintained.- Air conditioning systems will be cleaned and sanitised after each guest departure.- Hand sanitiser is provided for your convenience and comfort.- All surfaces, including high-touch points, will be thoroughly cleaned and disinfected.- We’ve removed some in-room amenities such as pens, notepads and guest directories, which are now available upon request.- For your safety and reassurance, daily housekeeping services are now only available upon request.

- All public areas are frequently cleaned and sanitised throughout the day by our dedicated sanitation team.- We use Ecolab cleaning products which comply with stringent WHO and government guidelines, but are also environmentally friendly.- Hand sanitiser dispensers have been placed at the entrance to all public outlets.

- All team members have been trained to adhere to WHO and national government guidelines to ensure everyone’s safety and wellbeing.- A Sun Siyam Cares Manager has been appointed at all resorts to implement and monitor our guidelines.- All team members undergo regular ongoing safety training.- Our frontline team members wear personal protective equipment whilst on duty.

- Our watersports, diving and fitness facilities are available in compliance with social distancing protocols.- Group activity numbers will be limited to enable social distancing.- Certain activities are only available for private parties. Details are available upon request.
- All resorts are staffed by a HPA certified medical officer.- All Maldivian resorts benefit from the care of a resident doctor, with no extra charges for guest consultations.
- Treatments must be pre-booked via our messaging service or by contacting the spa from your in-room phone.- Guests are politely required to shower prior to any treatments.

- Due to restricted numbers, the pre-booking of our Kids Club is highly recommended.- All children are politely required to shower prior to arrival.- Children under four are not permitted to use the facilities.- In line with government guidelines, babysitting services are temporarily suspended.
We look forward to welcoming you soon.

Guests often ask about the marine life spotted around Sun Siyam Olhuveli while planning their holiday experience. The pleasant surprise of seeing underwater marvels from the surface, such as the greetings from the Maldives Manta Rays, seems to be a real treat for all guests.

During one such experience, a visiting family had just finished their dinner. They were leaving the Sunset Restaurant when they saw a small crowd at the jetty and curiously walked over. When they saw the spectacle, they were astonished.

Six giant Manta Rays moved gracefully in the crystal clear waters. Similar to watching a large butterfly or a massive bird flying through the water, the gentle flap of its enormous wings will enthral you with gratitude for the Maldives’ underwater world.

There are different types of rays in the Maldives but those seen at Olhuveli are Reef Manta Rays in Maldives, easily differentiated by the V-shaped pattern on their back, unlike the T shape on the less commonly spotted Oceanic Manta Rays.
Manta Rays frequent Olhuveli to filter feed on planktons; the storm of tiny organisms seen when a light is turned on in the sea at night. Similar to moths, planktons are also drawn to light.
Wondering about the Manta Ray season Maldives? Luckily, it is all year around. Except for rainy days and rough seas, about four to six Mantas roam the jetty daily from around 7pm till midnight.
If you have never seen one and are wondering where to see Manta Rays in Maldives, Sun Siyam Olhuveli is the best place for you, all you have to do is visit and take a stroll past our jetty.
If you would like to see more join us on a Manta Ray snorkel or for Manta Ray diving and experience swimming with Manta Rays in Maldives.
If you have never seen one and are wondering where to see Manta Rays in Maldives, Sun Siyam Olhuveli is the best place for you, all you have to do is visit and take a stroll past our jetty.

Deffchonki Actress and singer Anastasia Denisova to perform at Sun Siyam Olhuveli Maldives
Actress and singer Anastasia Denisova performs live at the Sun Siyam Olhuveli Maldives on 19th May at 9pm.

Anastasia is most popular for her long standing role in the successful 2012 comedy Deffchonki which carried on for six seasons. In 2014, she starred in the Russian TV miniseries, Devushka srednikh let. She was also seen in Grazhdanka Katerina the following year. After venturing far with her acting roles, Anastasia then showed the world that she was just an amazing singer and songwriter, performing for the first time at a Grand Prix in 2017.

Anastasia’s passionate voice paired with her specialty of slow romantic songs will feed your soul. She will be performing both international and Russian songs as well as some of her own songs at the Lagoon Bar on 19th May, Wednesday at 9pm.

The Lagoon Bar is Sun Siyam Olhuveli’s hub for the most happening evening entertainment, set partially over the lagoon with indoor and outdoor seating, the venue invites the soothing Maldivian sea breeze. With lots of space to sway with the music, views of spectacular sunsets and a long list of tantalizing cocktails, the Lagoon Bar is the best place for live events.
Follow @sunsiyamolhuveli for more updates on Anastasia’s performance.

source.pc: Singers Shébani and Iman performing at Sun Siyam Olhuveli to compliment the Eid Festivities

segment.source: Sisters Shébani and Iman are set to perform at the Sun Siyam Olhuveli Maldives from 19
The artists will be giving separate performances spread across the Eid al Adha week in addition to the Eid celebrations at Olhuveli.

The Alternative singer-songwriter Shébani began her music career in 2015, with YouTube covers and open mic performances. However, not long after fans heard her first official release titled ‘Alter Ego’ in 2016. The Dubai based Iraqi singer has also studied song writing at the British and Irish Modern Music Institute in London, graduating as a song writer and performer just a year after her first release. Since then, Shébani’s music has received over one million streams on the Middle East and North African region’s streaming platform, Anghami.

While Shébani will be performing her English songs, her sister Iman Shaybani will be performing Arabic songs as well. Iman quit a long career in advertising to follow her passion for music, often performing alongside Shébani when the pair first began their musical journey together.

Catch Shébani and Iman in evening and sunset sessions. Evening sessions will be performed at the Sun Siyam Olhuveli’s Lagoon Bar and Dream Bar. While sunset sessions will be held at the Dhoni Bar pairing perfectly with the moving colours of the Maldivian golden hour.
Follow @sunsiyamolhuveli for more updates on the performances and upcoming Eid festivities.

file.original: 9814|DJ Don’t Touch My Hair set to perform

segment.source: DJ Don’t Touch My Hair set to perform
Dubai and Muscat based DJ Don’t Touch My Hair will be performing live at Sun Siyam Olhuveli Maldives from 15th to 21st August.

Omani fashion photographer turned model, Novemburus goes by the stage name DJ Don’t Touch My Hair. Known for her famous parties, she needs no introduction in the fashion and music scenes of the Middle East region.
Aside from inspiring many with effortless athleisure and streetwear looks, she is fondly remembered for her talent to surprise and move crowds to music they forgot they loved.

DJ Don’t Touch My Hair’s curated mix of sounds include current hits with smooth spins of RnB, Hip Hop and Afro Beats and a touch of nostalgia with throwbacks to popular songs from the 80s through to the 2000s.

Catch her perform live during the Evening Session at the Lagoon Bar on 16th August from 9pm till midnight. She returns to the stage once again for the Sundowner with Management Cocktails on 19th August on the beach, while a second Sunset Session is also set for 21st August at the Dhoni Bar.
With world-class mixology, the Dhoni Bar at Sun Siyam Olhuveli is a chic lounge with an infinity pool reflecting the colours of the wide sweeping sunsets and the colours of the Maldivian golden hour.

The Lagoon Bar at Sun Siyam Olhuveli is the best venue for the most happening live entertainment, set partially overwater with an indoor and outdoor area, inviting soothing Maldivian sea breeze with spectacular sunset views, a long list of tantalizing cocktails as well as ample space to sway with the music.

Sun Siyam Olhuveli is a hub for exciting music events with the most recent being multiple live performances for the Eid-Al-Adha festivities with Dubai based sisters Shébani and Iman as well as the Multi-Platinum rapper Tinie Tempah’s official tour DJ, DJ Charlesy.
Follow @sunsiyamolhuveli for updates on DJ Don’t Touch My Hair’s upcoming performances.
Please browse our offers to book your stay with Sun Siyam Olhuveli.

ONEVIOLIN set to perform at Sun Siyam Olhuveli this November
Finland’s Got Talent 2020 runner-up Pekka Niemi will be performing live at Sun Siyam Olhuveli Maldives from 22nd - 29th November.
His stage name ONEVIOLIN needs no introduction in music scenes, famous for his covers of global hits, producing countless sounds, from the melody to drums, with just a single Violin.

Niemi’s mash up performance in the Got Talent Finals consisted of a spectacular 1,500 violin tracks. Videos of his covers have gathered vast international interest, being watched over millions of times on his social media platforms.
Niemi has been working internationally as a violinist, songwriter and string producer from a young age. He also studied at one of the most prestigious conservatoires, the Royal College of Music.

source.pc: Water Adventures at Sun Siyam Olhuveli Maldives

segment.source: The Maldives is known for its colourful waters so guests love to explore the seas surrounding Sun Siyam Olhuveli Maldives in South Male’ Atoll.
The exciting water sports packages, lessons and courses mean you will never run out of ways to tour the mesmerising Ocean blues during your stay.

For couples, celebrate your time together and experience the spectacular nature of the Maldives with the Couple’s Adventure Package, which includes sailing the catamaran to a sandbank for an hour. The package for two also offers 15 minutes of Parasailing and 10 minutes on the Fun Tube Ride.

For families, the Family Fun Package comes with a speedboat ride to your chosen three locations including to a sandbank and to different spots where you can meet Turtles, Dolphins and Mantas. Families can also enjoy their choice from the Banana Ride and the Fun Tube Ride. The package also offers half an hour of Jet Ski rental.

Meanwhile, the Discovery Package lets you experience and study a new sport at the same time. It includes a speedboat ride with the joyful Dolphins. Guests get a choice between Catamaran Sailing with Skipper or a Jet Ski ride with the guide.

You also get to cross off wind surfing off your bucket list, with a private lesson from our seasoned water sports professionals. For double the treat, bring along a second person free of any extra charges.

If you would like to go on some aquatic adventures on your own, the individuals’ Extreme Package allows you to learn Fly Boarding and Water Skiing. You can also hop on the Jet Ski and explore Sun Siyam Olhuveli’s idyllic surroundings.

With one of the best water sports teams in Maldives, the beach resort also offers lessons. Our expert guides’ help guests learn the skills and techniques needed for kite boarding, windsurfing and catamaran sailing.

A short boat ride can also take guests to the unique experience of snorkelling around a hidden shipwreck but if you seek a daring adventure, discover the reef come alive after dark with the night snorkelling experience.

A Tropical Wonderland experience awaits this festive season
Transforming our two paradise islands into an immersive entertainment venue with the magical charms of Maldivian nature, Sun Siyam Olhuveli brings you a specially curated program this season to create extraordinary experiences.The main acts include Marvin Humes, Jessica Agombar, DJ Charlesy and 2 Sense performing live through Christmas and New Year.

segment.source: Marvin Humes is listed as one of the names in MixMag’s ‘Artists to Watch’ feature, Marvin is an English singer and International DJ. He expands his reach to the island after a series of sets in Ibiza this summer.

Grammy nominated singer and songwriter, Jessica Agombar, was part of the hit British girl group Parade before she wrote the worldwide hits; Dynamite for BTS and What a Man Gotta Do for the Jonas Brothers.

The revisiting renown DJ Charlesy emerged as a trusted selector while putting together his London club events, with the talent of understanding what makes people dance and the technical side of music. The Multi-genre artist is best known as the official tour DJ for the Multi-Platinum rapper Tinie Tempah. Since then he has performed around the globe from Ibizia and Las Vegas to Australia as well as at the world famous London Wireless Festival, leading him to major UK festivals such as the V Festival and the Glastonbury Festival.

Since then he has performed around the globe from Ibizia and Las Vegas to Australia as well as at the world famous London Wireless Festival, leading him to major UK festivals such as the V Festival and the Glastonbury Festival.
Charlesy will be performing across an evening session at the Lagoon Bar and a sunset session at the Dhoni Bar.

Is the resort child friendly?Our resort is ideal for families with children of all ages, and we’ve taken extra care to design offers and experiences that guarantee smooth sailing all through your stay.
What time can I check in?Guests are welcome to check in from 14.00, and we kindly ask that you check out by 12.00 on the day of departure.

Are there different meal options available?We offer a choice between Bed and Breakfast, Half Board, Full Board and All Inclusive – there’s a suitable plan for everyone. For further details on the venues you can enjoy with your chosen meal option, please get in touch.

Are Gala Dinners included in my meal option?For guests staying during the holiday season, we hold special Gala Dinners on Christmas Day and New Year’s Day at an extra cost. Please get in touch for more information.
What credit cards do you accept?We accept American Express, Visa and MasterCard.
Are all taxes included?Our rates exclude applicable taxes and service changes. Goods and Services is added at 12%, and Service Charge at 10 %.
What currency can I use at the resort?We accept USD, GBP and Euro.
Can I park my car at the resort?Onsite parking is available for our guests.
Can I use my drone at the resort?We take the privacy and safety of our guests very seriously, and therefore have a strict No Drone Policy in place. The full policy is outlined below.

We prohibit the operation of unmanned aerial systems or drones, on or above the resort by any of our guests or employees — including model aircraft by recreational users. This includes drones used for filming or videotaping, as well as drones used by media or journalists operating above or within the resort area boundaries. This prohibition extends to any devices launched or operated from the property, as well as any launched from private property outside of the resort area boundaries.
Sun Siyam Resorts may use drones for commercial purposes on sporadic occasions. In these instances, much care will be taken to minimize the impact on guests and to protect their privacy.

We prohibit the operation of unmanned aerial systems or drones, on or above the resort by any of our guests or employees — including model aircraft by recreational users. This includes drones used for filming or videotaping, as well as drones used by media or journalists operating above or within the resort area boundaries. This prohibition extends to any devices launched or operated from the property, as well as any launched from private property outside of the resort area boundaries.
Sun Siyam Resorts may use drones for commercial purposes on sporadic occasions. In these instances, much care will be taken to minimize the impact on guests and to protect their privacy.

source.pc: Sun Siyam Vilu Reef puts the focus on its environment and wellness.

segment.source: Sun Siyam Vilu Reef focused on the island environment and wellness, celebrating global environment day and ocean day with meaningful activities.
Guests and staff gathered together to plant trees sourced from a nearby farming island, in four areas of the resort's island home to mark the globally observed Environment Day.
Located in South Nilandhe Atoll, Sun Siyam Vilu Reef is just one of the five-star resort of the multi-award winning hospitality group Sun Siyam Resorts.

Meanwhile, celebrations for World Ocean Day kicked off with staff informing guests about the importance of restoring marine ecosystems, especially for countries like Maldives, which bear coral reefs as their natural protection.

Guests were excited for coral planting and began with a dip in the water to collect dead corals— which were then, stringed on to a tall frame. Once the structures were ready to be submerged, guests dived to plant them at the resort's house reef.

At Sun Siyam Vilu Reef, however, environmental efforts are not just for celebrations but part of an everyday effort to conserve their island home and facilitate a better world. This is evident as you snorkel spotting some of the best coral reefs in Maldives and also a thriving coral garden resulting from coral planting efforts throughout the past five years.

With its cosy Maldivian vibes evoking blissful contentment, Vilu Reef is also just as idyllic for wellness. On the morning of global Wellness Day, guests geared up for a 2km run around the island and in the spirit of wellness, all participants also received a complimentary 10-minute head and shoulder massage from the spa. Celebrations continued with cheerful dances to the exhilarating rhythms of Zumba, overlooking spectacular hues of the sunset.
The resort is now gearing up for International Yoga Day with a Sunset Yoga session on June 21

Sun Siyam Vilu Reef boasts indulgent villas and suites across a long strip of white sand beaches on a vast emerald lagoon, offering soothing spa treatments, adventurous island hopping day trips and uniquely private cinemas under the stars, while some of the best coral reef leave you in complete awe.
If you would like to experience the journey of relaxation that has left many honeymooners wanting more, please browse through offers.

source.pc: Sun Siyam Iru Veli ranks fifth All-Inclusive resort in the world on
TripAdvisor Traveler’s Choice Awards 2021 and ranking first in Asia

segment.source: Sun Siyam Iru Veli is proud to announce it has been ranked the fifth all-inclusive resort in the world by TripAdvisor Traveler’s Choice Awards 2021, and ranked as first in Asia.
Iru Veli ranked fifth place in the list of TripAdvisor Traveler’s Choice Best of the Best awards for top 25 resorts in the world offering an all-inclusive meal plan for 2021.

Located in South Nilandhe Atoll, Sun Siyam Iru Veli is just one of the five-star resort of the multi-award-winning hospitality group Sun Siyam Resorts’ laid-back luxury resorts, owning and managing four luxury private island properties in the Maldives and a boutique beach retreat on the East Coast of Sri Lanka.

Commenting on the award, Iru Veli’s General Manager, Dennis Hordiienko said “the award puts the resort at the top in terms of providing a worry-free holiday experience with our Premium All-Inclusive Signature Plan, with great inclusions, for example, credits for spa treatments, diving and motorised water sports, so our guests can indulge in a multitude of extraordinary experiences without having to worry about additional costs.”

The meal plan also includes a host of dining options including extensive sparkling wine breakfast buffets, a selection of free excursions combined with value additions such as a complimentary day visit to Sun Siyam’s sister property Vilu Reef inclusive of lunch and drinks.

The award is the highest honor bestowed by the global travel platform, which chooses its winners using a proprietary algorithm verifying reviews from millions of travelers around the world, submitted over a 12-month period, reflecting the best of the best in customer satisfaction, service and quality, according to TripAdvisor.

Sun Siyam Iru Veli boasts chic and spacious suites on pristine white beaches within a sweeping cerulean lagoon, with a spa, an SSI dive center and six F&B outlets including an exclusive adults-only pool bar hosting exciting weekly pool parties, presenting itself as the ultimate tropical retreat for indulgent experiences.

Whether you’re hosting a large group of friends or simply want to enjoy the luxury of space – treat yourself to this incredibly spacious and contemporary 4 Bedroom Beach Residence.
